Team 4795



The Eastbots

Welcome to the new website of Team 4795, the Eastbots! We are a student-run team from East Chapel Hill High School. We are a sixth-year team and will compete in the 2017 NC THOR robotics competition as well as the 2018 FIRST Robotics competition.

FIRST's Mission



"To transform our culture by creating a world where science and technology are celebrated and where young people dream of becoming science and technology leaders."
Dean Kamen, Founder
